LocaleLayoutMetadata.name: BoonWeGig
LocaleLayoutMetadata.description: Discover indie concerts, underground venues, and local artists in South Korea.
LocaleLayoutMetadata.keywords: Korea indie concert, Korea local show, Korea live music, Korea underground concert

CityPageMetadata.description: Discover indie concerts, underground venues, and local artists in {city}
CityPageMetadata.keywords: {city} indie concert, {city} local show, {city} live music, {city} underground concert

VenuesPageMetadata.keywords: {city} indie venues, {city} local venues, {city} underground venues

VenuePageMetadata.description: Concert schedule, location info, and venue details for {venueName}

VenuesPage.note: don't see your venue listed? reach out to us to have it included.

AboutPage.bio: i made BoonWeGig because it was too damn hard to find local indie shows in korea
AboutPage.nameBlurb: the name is a play on words with the word 'gig' and the korean word '분위기' (boon-we-gi) which means mood/atmosphere
AboutPage.contactBlurb: if you have any feedback or want to get in touch please email me at boonwegig@gmail.com
